snippet: Chrysler will recall more than 228,000 vehicles because their airbags could unexpectedly inflate without a crash.
abstract: Chrysler will recall more than 228,000 Jeep Cherokees because their airbags could unexpectedly deploy even without a crash; it will upgrade airbag software.
lead_paragraph: Chrysler will recall more than 228,000 vehicles because their airbags could unexpectedly inflate without a crash.

headline.print_headline: Jeep Cherokees to Be Recalled to Upgrade Airbag Software
headline.main: Jeep Cherokees to Be Recalled to Upgrade Airbag Software
